item.description:
Hi All,

Please join us for a panel discussion on how you can find and purchase a great property.

Despite the doom and gloom, the real estate market is booming locally and there has never been a better time to invest in your future through owing a piece of the American Dream -

your own home.  We will have a panel of professionals - a Newton realtor, a real estate attorney and mortgage lender to lead an informative discussion and answer any question you may have about buying your first home or as investment property.  Refreshments will be provided.

We hope to see many of you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Keller Williams Realty is across from a Bank of America.
item.name: Home Buying Seminar - The Keys to Home Buying Success in 2013
